channel.title: [317] compiler issue
channel.description:
Error Code [code]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Compiler Code [code]@echo off title Compile "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
I set my variables and I have the jdk 26 and everything is right. I think that it may have something to due with the source. All the class files are in a bin folder inside the source and all the java files are in a src folder. Any ideas?

item.title: [317] compiler issue
item.dc:creator: @iLuckyBeaTz iLuckyBeaTz
item.description:
@iLuckyBeaTz wrote:

Error Code

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .

Compiler Code

@echo off title Compile "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

I set my variables and I have the jdk 26 and everything is right. I think that it may have something to due with the source. All the class files are in a bin folder inside the source and all the java files are in a src folder. Any ideas?
